connector.description: Perform cache operations on an Ignite cache or consume changes from a continuous query.

camel.source.endpoint.propagateIncomingB.name: camel.source.endpoint.propagateIncomingBodyIfNoReturnValue
camel.source.endpoint.propagateIncomingB.description: Sets whether to propagate the incoming body if the return type of the underlying Ignite operation is void.

camel.source.endpoint.treatCollectionsAs.name: camel.source.endpoint.treatCollectionsAsCacheObjects
camel.source.endpoint.treatCollectionsAs.description: Sets whether to treat Collections as cache objects or as Collections of items to insert/update/compute, etc.

camel.source.endpoint.autoUnsubscribe.name: camel.source.endpoint.autoUnsubscribe
camel.source.endpoint.autoUnsubscribe.description: Whether auto unsubscribe is enabled in the Continuous Query Consumer. Default value notice: ContinuousQuery.DFLT_AUTO_UNSUBSCRIBE

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.fireExistingQueryR.name: camel.source.endpoint.fireExistingQueryResults
camel.source.endpoint.fireExistingQueryR.description: Whether to process existing results that match the query. Used on initialization of the Continuous Query Consumer.

camel.source.endpoint.oneExchangePerUpda.name: camel.source.endpoint.oneExchangePerUpdate
camel.source.endpoint.oneExchangePerUpda.description: Whether to pack each update in an individual Exchange, even if multiple updates are received in one batch. Only used by the Continuous Query Consumer.

camel.source.endpoint.pageSize.name: camel.source.endpoint.pageSize
camel.source.endpoint.pageSize.description: The page size. Only used by the Continuous Query Consumer. Default value notice: ContinuousQuery.DFLT_PAGE_SIZE

camel.source.endpoint.query.name: camel.source.endpoint.query
camel.source.endpoint.query.description: The Query to execute, only needed for operations that require it, and for the Continuous Query Consumer.

camel.source.endpoint.remoteFilter.name: camel.source.endpoint.remoteFilter
camel.source.endpoint.remoteFilter.description: The remote filter, only used by the Continuous Query Consumer.

camel.source.endpoint.timeInterval.name: camel.source.endpoint.timeInterval
camel.source.endpoint.timeInterval.description: The time interval for the Continuous Query Consumer. Default value notice: ContinuousQuery.DFLT_TIME_INTERVAL

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.ignite-cache.configurati.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.configurationResource
camel.component.ignite-cache.configurati.description: The resource from where to load the configuration. It can be a: URL, String or InputStream type.

camel.component.ignite-cache.ignite.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.ignite
camel.component.ignite-cache.ignite.description: To use an existing Ignite instance.

camel.component.ignite-cache.igniteConfi.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.igniteConfiguration
camel.component.ignite-cache.igniteConfi.description: Allows the user to set a programmatic ignite configuration.

camel.component.ignite-cache.bridgeError.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.ignite-cache.bridgeError.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.ignite-cache.autowiredEn.name: camel.component.ignite-cache.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.ignite-cache.autowiredEn.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.
